title: Implement cookie consent banner (GDPR compliance)
description:
Implement GDPR-compliant cookie consent banner for EU visitors.

Requirements:
- Show banner on first visit
- Categories: Essential, Analytics, Marketing (if applicable)
- Allow accept all / reject all / customize
- Remember user preference
- Link to Privacy Policy
- Bilingual support (IT/EN)
- Block non-essential cookies until consent given

Before implementing, audit current cookie usage:
- Check if site uses any cookies/tracking
- Google Analytics? Other analytics?
- Third-party scripts?

Consider libraries:
- CookieYes
- Osano
- Custom lightweight solution

Must comply with Italian GDPR implementation (stricter than general EU).
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Cookie banner appears on first visit
- [ ] User can accept/reject cookies
- [ ] Choice is persisted
- [ ] Analytics only load after consent
notes:
## Implementation (2026-01-24)

### Approach: Two-Click Maps + Self-Hosted Fonts
No traditional cookie banner needed - site was already privacy-friendly.

### Changes Made:
1. **Self-hosted Lora font**
   - Downloaded Latin subset (regular + italic) to public/fonts/
   - Updated Layout.astro with local @font-face declarations
   - Eliminates Google Fonts CDN connection

2. **ConsentMap component** (src/components/ConsentMap.astro)
   - Shows placeholder with consent message
   - Loads Google Maps only after user click
   - Stores consent in localStorage
   - Bilingual (EN/IT) support

3. **Updated contact pages**
   - src/pages/en/contact.astro
   - src/pages/it/contatti.astro

### Files Added:
- public/fonts/lora-latin.woff2
- public/fonts/lora-latin-italic.woff2
- src/components/ConsentMap.astro

### Files Modified:
- src/layouts/Layout.astro (font hosting)
- src/pages/en/contact.astro
- src/pages/it/contatti.astro
close_reason: Implemented two-click consent for Google Maps + self-hosted fonts. No cookie banner needed - site has no cookies/tracking. Privacy-compliant solution.

title: Audit current cookie and tracking usage
description:
Audit the website to identify all cookies, tracking scripts, and third-party integrations currently in use.

Check for:
- Session cookies
- Analytics (Google Analytics, Plausible, etc.)
- Social media pixels/widgets
- CDN tracking
- Font providers (Google Fonts - may set cookies)
- Any third-party scripts

Document:
1. List all cookies/trackers found
2. Categorize each (essential, analytics, marketing)
3. Identify which require consent
4. Determine if any can be removed/replaced with privacy-friendly alternatives

This informs the cookie banner implementation and privacy policy content.
acceptance_criteria: - [ ] Document all cookies used\n- [ ] Document all tracking scripts\n- [ ] Identify which are essential vs optional
notes:
## Audit Findings (2026-01-24)

### Cookies: NONE
- No document.cookie usage
- No localStorage/sessionStorage usage
- Site sets zero cookies

### Analytics: NONE  
- No Google Analytics
- No Plausible or other tracking
- No marketing pixels

### Third-Party Integrations:
1. **Google Fonts** (Lora) - src/layouts/Layout.astro:38
   - Connects to fonts.googleapis.com
   - Decision: Self-host to eliminate

2. **Google Maps Embed** - contact pages
   - src/pages/en/contact.astro:39-47
   - src/pages/it/contatti.astro:39-47
   - May set cookies, requires consent
   - Decision: Two-click consent pattern

### Categorization:
- Essential: None currently
- Analytics: None
- Marketing: None
- Third-party requiring consent: Google Maps only
close_reason: Audit complete. Site is privacy-friendly: no cookies, no analytics. Only Google Fonts (CDN) and Google Maps embed found. Documented findings in notes.
